content.title: Financial Assistance for Working Women Workers or Wives of Male Workers for Maternity- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.beneficiary: Working Women Workers or Wives of Male Workers
content.details: This scheme provides financial assistance to working women workers or wives of male workers for maternity-related expenses.
benefits: Support for working women during maternity leave
eligibility: Must be a working woman or wife of a male worker
Must be registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.application_process: Online application through the Haryana Labour Welfare Board website and Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
